title: LFT SoloQ is not the answer to climb or have fun in LOL
body:
LFT soloq is hell and i play well but the teams tend to throw, looking for team to have fun with learn more and play better and to a higher skillcap.

I main Supp 
but can fill all roles im constantly bouncing between b5-b3.

anyteams want to try me out or let me in let us know cheers.

replies.body: happy for a duo, and a full team if possible, IGN Obliviscaris add me!
